property.name: Host
property.description: Default = "localhost". The location of the FTP server.

property.name: KeepAlive
property.description: Default = *[xb:.f.]*. Defines whether or not the connection to the FTP server should be closed after the request completes. If *[xb:.t.]*, connection will remain open. Otherwise, connection will be closed.

property.name: UsePassive
property.description: Default = *[xb:.t.]*. Gets or sets the behavior of the data transfer process.

property.name: EnableSSL
property.description: Default = *[xb:.f.]*. If *[xb:.t.]*, FTPS will be used.

property.name: RequireValidCertificate
property.description: Default = *[xb:.t.]*. Defines whether or not a valid certificate is required to establish a connection.

property.name: BufferSize
property.description: Default = 8192. The size of the buffer.

property.name: TimeOut
property.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for a request. If no request is received within the specified time frame, the operation is aborted.

property.name: TotalLength
property.description: The total size of the data.

property.name: SampleEventScript
property.description: A sample event script that can be used as a framework to create your own event script.
